market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all commercial natural gas heating/water heating; no commercial buildings with electric heating or water heating are switched

cooling.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B30: Cooling energy sources, number of buildings and floorspace, 2012
cooling.fraction_derivation: Cooling multiple of 55.7% was determined as the proportion of total commercial square footage with cooling where heating uses natural gas from CBECS 2012 microdata. Total square footage with electric cooling in the sample was 73,614 million ft^2, total square footage with cooling where natural gas is the primary space-heating energy source was 40,980 million ft^2

_description: Multi-function natural gas-fired heat pump affecting commercial heating, cooling, and water heating end uses
